ProductDetail.MetaKeywords: unicorns attack, picture, image, book, makit, makitCommerce
ProductDetail.ProductShortDescription: Unicorns Attack shows lots of pictures of what Unicorns attacking different humans would look like.
ProductDetail.ProductLongDescription: This book is not meant for children, or senior citizens, nor people who like humans and unicorns. It depicts Unicorns attacking Humans whilst they go about day to day life.
